overview: Nurses whose asses are in heat, this is the synopsis of this film which takes you through a universe in the hospital that is both stressful and exciting. But here there are no sick people, just nurses who are crazy about sex, who jump on male-nurses to empty out their balls using fellatio and intense sodomy. In the offices, under the stairs or in patients' rooms, these women in white blouses do not cease to have the most violent orgasms.
title: Bedside Manner
